idea:
We are new to the Business but not new to the Market. We are a team of Young Brigade with an experience of 15 to
25 years in various sectors with flavours of Banking, IT, Management, Logistics, Trade Finance, Vendor Management,
etc.etc.
Our Aim is to help India make Self Developed Nation by helping all the Manufacturers’ in various industries and the
Agro Industries and the Self Made Innovative young Entrepreneur’s. We want to take our Indian Goods across to
Overseas International Market and spread the Indian Brand to almost all Continent across all Countries. Currently,
our growth on Export is increasing @speed of snail due to many known and unknown facts. We want to take the
best of the opportunity now or never, because the current Reformation & Change Management as declared by the
Government of India to promote the SME, MSME, and especially to boost the Exports is the Better then the Best.
